name: STM32_ISR_Servo
keywords: timing, device, control, timer, interrupt, isr, isr-based, hardware-timer, mission-critical, accuracy, precise, non-blocking, stm32, stm32h7, stm32l5, stm32f1, stm32f4, stm32f7, stm32g4, servo
description: This library enables you to use 1 Hardware Timer on an STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1-based board to control up to 16 or more servo motors.
